name: Solitaire (itch) (Richard233)
description:
The first Godot project coded by myself ;D. Enjoy!

A solitaire game (kind of hard for me) made in order to learn more about the Godot engine. Click on the card to select the first card and click on the second card to place the first one selected.

Credit:

Code by: Richard Jiang

Assets by: https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Rules:

Tableau: A tableau has seven piles of cards. In order to place a card on top of a pile, that card must be 1 rank below the previous card and has a different colour than the previous card.

Stock: Any cards that aren't in the tableau piles are stored in the stock.


Foundation: The four piles of cards in the right. Cards can only be placed on top of foundations when it's 1 rank above, and has the same suit of the previous card.

Winning condition: The game is won when 4 piles of perfect cards are made in the tableau or in the foundation piles. (I don't have the picture of the winning condition image, because I am too bad at my own game ;-;)
